SUIT (v3.4)
    http://www.diedrichsenlab.org/imaging/suit.htm
    http://www.diedrichsenlab.org/imaging/suit_download.htm

SPM12 (r7771)
    https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/
    https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/download/restricted/eldorado/spm12.zip

Installing SPM12 with SUIT:
   1. Unzip spm12.zip
   2. Unzip suit_v3.4.zip
   3. Clean up SUIT by removing __MACOSX and suit/.git directories
   3. Move suit directory to spm12/toolbox directory
